mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (id, subject, content, readcount, reg_date, ip, re_ref, re_lev, re_seq) VALUES (#{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{readcount}, #{regDate}, #{ip}, #{reRef}, #{reLev}, #{reSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY re_ref DESC, re_seq ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice
WHERE subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

SELECT * FROM notice
WHERE subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY re_ref DESC, re_seq ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
